Hi Rajeshwari!

You could either use api of junix 
(http://www.extreme-java.de/junitx/changelog.html) or PrivateAccssor 
class of http://sourceforge.net/projects/junit-addons to test the 
private methods.

Nagendra


Ilja Preuss wrote:

> rajeshwari_83 wrote:
> > I need to
> > write a JUNIT for this class specifically the private methods of this
> > class.
>
> Why do you need to test the private methods?
>
> Curious, Ilja
